item.title: Rep. Greene: Sanctuary States, Cities Could Lose Funding
item.description: Sanctuary states and cities could lose their funding, Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene told Fox News' "Sunday Morning Futures."

item.title: Sen. Barrasso: 'Fair' Hearings for Trump Nominees
item.description: Sen. John Barrasso, R-Wyo., said on Sunday that every nominee of President-elect Donald Trump will have a "fair" hearing.
